summary: Alvin Corwin is low man on the totem pole, and goes from one mishap to another at an army training camp in World War II.
cast: Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Mike Kellin|Jimmie Dundee|Dick Stabile|Tommy Farrell|Frank Hyers|Danny Dayton|William Mendrek|Kenneth Forbes|Paul Livermore|Ty Perry|Jean Ruth|Angela Greene|Polly Bergen|Douglas Evans|Stephen Roberts|Al Negbo|Dewey Robinson|Harry Baum|Lee Bennett|Boyd Cabeen|Charles Cirillo|Joe Gray|Jimmie Horan|Joe Ploski
title: Â¡Vaya par de soldados!
